mapper.select: select count(1) from bt_person where email = #{email};
select p.id, p.surname, p.firstname, p.email, p.phone from bt_person as p where p.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into bt_person (surname, firstname, email, phone) VALUE (#{name}, #{firstname}, #{email}, #{phone});
mapper.select: select p.id, p.surname, p.firstname, p.email, p.phone from bt_farmer as f join bt_person p on p.id = f.id where p.id = #{id};
select p.id, p.surname, p.firstname, p.email, p.phone from bt_helper as h join bt_person p on p.id = h.id where p.id = #{id};
